verses.verse: Then <WG3767> Jesus<WG2424> six<WG1803> days<WG2250> before<WG4253> the<WG3588> passover<WG3957> came<WG2064> to<WG1519> Bethany,<WG963> where<WG3699> Lazarus<WG2976> was<WG2258> which had been dead,<WG2348> whom<WG3739> he raised<WG1453> from<WG1537> the dead.<WG3498>

<WG3767> There<WG1563> they made<WG4160> him<WG4160> a supper;<WG1173> and<WG2532> Martha<WG3136> served:<WG1247> but<WG1161> Lazarus<WG2976> was<WG2258> one<WG1520> of them that sat at the table with<WG4873> him.<WG846>

Then <WG3767> took<WG2983> Mary<WG3137> a pound<WG3046> of ointment<WG3464> of spikenard,<WG4101> <WG3487> very costly,<WG4186> and anointed<WG218> the<WG3588> feet<WG4228> of Jesus,<WG2424> and<WG2532> wiped<WG1591> his<WG846> feet<WG4228> with her<WG848> hair:<WG2359> and<WG1161> the<WG3588> house<WG3614> was filled<WG4137> with<WG1537> the<WG3588> odor<WG3744> of the<WG3588> ointment.<WG3464>
Then <WG3767> saith<WG3004> one<WG1520> of<WG1537> his<WG846> disciples,<WG3101> Judas<WG2455> Iscariot,<WG2469> Simon's<WG4613> son, which should<WG3195> betray<WG3860> him,<WG846>
Why <WG1302> was not<WG3756> this<WG5124> ointment<WG3464> sold<WG4097> for three hundred<WG5145> pence,<WG1220> and<WG2532> given<WG1325> to the poor?<WG4434>

<WG1161> This<WG5124> he said,<WG2036> not<WG3756> that<WG3754> he<WG846> cared<WG3199> for<WG4012> the<WG3588> poor;<WG4434> but<WG235> because<WG3754> he was<WG2258> a thief,<WG2812> and<WG2532> had<WG2192> the<WG3588> bag,<WG1101> and<WG2532> bare<WG941> what was put<WG906> therein.
Then <WG3767> said<WG2036> Jesus,<WG2424> Let her alone: <WG863> <WG846> against <WG1519> the<WG3588> day<WG2250> of my<WG3450> burying<WG1780> hath she kept<WG5083> this. <WG846>
For <WG1063> the<WG3588> poor<WG4434> always<WG3842> ye have<WG2192> with<WG3326> you;<WG1438> but<WG1161> me<WG1691> ye have<WG2192> not<WG3756> always. <WG3842>

Much <WG4183> people<WG3793> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> Jews<WG2453> therefore<WG3767> knew<WG1097> that<WG3754> he was<WG2076> there:<WG1563> and<WG2532> they came<WG2064> not<WG3756> for Jesus' sake<WG1223> <WG2424> only,<WG3440> but<WG235> that<WG2443> they might see<WG1492> Lazarus<WG2976> also,<WG2532> whom<WG3739> he had raised<WG1453> from<WG1537> the dead.<WG3498>
But <WG1161> the<WG3588> chief priests<WG749> consulted<WG1011> that<WG2443> they might put Lazarus also to death;<WG615> <WG2976> <WG2532>
Because <WG3754> that by reason of<WG1223> him<WG846> many<WG4183> of the<WG3588> Jews<WG2453> went away,<WG5217> and<WG2532> believed<WG4100> on<WG1519> Jesus.<WG2424>

On the<WG3588> next day<WG1887> much<WG4183> people<WG3793> that were come<WG2064> to<WG1519> the<WG3588> feast,<WG1859> when they heard<WG191> that<WG3754> Jesus<WG2424> was coming<WG2064> to<WG1519> Jerusalem,<WG2414>

Took <WG2983> branches<WG902> of palm trees,<WG5404> and<WG2532> went forth<WG1831> to<WG1519> meet<WG5222> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> cried,<WG2896> Hosanna:<WG5614> Blessed<WG2127> is the<WG3588> King<WG935> of Israel<WG2474> that cometh<WG2064> in<WG1722> the name<WG3686> of the Lord.<WG2962>
And <WG1161> Jesus,<WG2424> when he had found<WG2147> a young ass,<WG3678> sat<WG2523> thereon;<WG1909> <WG846> as<WG2531> it is<WG2076> written,<WG1125>
Fear <WG5399> not,<WG3361> daughter<WG2364> of Zion;<WG4622> behold,<WG2400> thy<WG4675> King<WG935> cometh,<WG2064> sitting<WG2521> on<WG1909> an ass's<WG3688> colt.<WG4454>

<WG1161> These things<WG5023> understood<WG1097> not<WG3756> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> at the first:<WG4412> but<WG235> when<WG3753> Jesus<WG2424> was glorified,<WG1392> then<WG5119> remembered<WG3415> they that<WG3754> these things<WG5023> were<WG2258> written<WG1125> of<WG1909> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> that they had done<WG4160> these things<WG5023> unto him.<WG846>

The <WG3588> people<WG3793> therefore<WG3767> that was<WG5607> with<WG3326> him<WG846> when<WG3753> he called<WG5455> Lazarus<WG2976> out of<WG1537> his grave,<WG3419> and<WG2532> raised<WG1453> him<WG846> from<WG1537> the dead,<WG3498> bare record.<WG3140>
For this cause<WG1223> <WG5124> the<WG3588> people<WG3793> also<WG2532> met<WG5221> him,<WG846> for<WG3754> that they heard<WG191> that he<WG846> had done<WG4160> this<WG5124> miracle.<WG4592>

The <WG3588> Pharisees<WG5330> therefore<WG3767> said<WG2036> among<WG4314> themselves,<WG1438> Perceive<WG2334> ye how<WG3754> ye prevail<WG5623> <WG3756> nothing?<WG3762> behold,<WG2396> the<WG3588> world<WG2889> is gone<WG565> after<WG3694> him.<WG846>
And <WG1161> there were<WG2258> certain<WG5100> Greeks<WG1672> among<WG1537> them that came up<WG305> to<WG2443> worship<WG4352> at<WG1722> the<WG3588> feast: <WG1859>

The same<WG3778> came<WG4334> therefore<WG3767> to Philip,<WG5376> which<WG3588> was of<WG575> Bethsaida<WG966> of Galilee,<WG1056> and<WG2532> desired<WG2065> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> Sir,<WG2962> we would<WG2309> see<WG1492> Jesus.<WG2424>
Philip <WG5376> cometh<WG2064> and<WG2532> telleth<WG3004> Andrew:<WG406> and<WG2532> again<WG3825> Andrew<WG406> and<WG2532> Philip<WG5376> tell<WG3004> Jesus.<WG2424>
And <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> them,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> The <WG3588> hour<WG5610> is come,<WG2064> that<WG2443> the<WG3588> Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> should be glorified. <WG1392>

Verily, <WG281> verily,<WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you,<WG5213> Except<WG3362> a corn<WG2848> of wheat<WG4621> fall<WG4098> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> ground<WG1093> and die,<WG599> it<WG846> abideth<WG3306> alone: <WG3441> but<WG1161> if<WG1437> it die,<WG599> it bringeth forth<WG5342> much<WG4183> fruit. <WG2590>

He that loveth<WG5368> his<WG848> life<WG5590> shall lose<WG622> it;<WG846> and<WG2532> he that hateth<WG3404> his<WG848> life<WG5590> in<WG1722> this<WG5129> world<WG2889> shall keep<WG5442> it<WG846> unto<WG1519> life<WG2222> eternal. <WG166>

If <WG1437> any man<WG5100> serve<WG1247> me,<WG1698> let him follow<WG190> me;<WG1698> and<WG2532> where<WG3699> I<WG1473> am,<WG1510> there<WG1563> shall also<WG2532> my<WG1699> servant<WG1249> be: <WG2071> <WG2532> if <WG1437> any man<WG5100> serve<WG1247> me,<WG1698> him<WG846> will my Father<WG3962> honor. <WG5091>

Now <WG3568> is my<WG3450> soul<WG5590> troubled;<WG5015> and<WG2532> what<WG5101> shall I say?<WG2036> Father,<WG3962> save<WG4982> me<WG3165> from<WG1537> this<WG5026> hour: <WG5610> but<WG235> for this cause <WG1223> <WG5124> came <WG2064> I unto<WG1519> this<WG5026> hour. <WG5610>

Father, <WG3962> glorify<WG1392> thy<WG4675> name. Then<WG3686> <WG3767> came<WG2064> there a voice<WG5456> from<WG1537> heaven,<WG3772> saying, I have both<WG2532> glorified<WG1392> it, and<WG2532> will glorify<WG1392> it again.<WG3825>

The <WG3588> people<WG3793> therefore,<WG3767> that stood by,<WG2476> and<WG2532> heard<WG191> it, said<WG3004> that it thundered:<WG1096> <WG1027> others<WG243> said,<WG3004> An angel<WG32> spake<WG2980> to him.<WG846>
Jesus <WG2424> answered<WG611> and<WG2532> said,<WG2036> This <WG3778> voice<WG5456> came<WG1096> not<WG3756> because<WG1223> of me,<WG1691> but<WG235> for your sakes. <WG1223> <WG5209>
Now <WG3568> is<WG2076> the judgment<WG2920> of this<WG5127> world: <WG2889> now<WG3568> shall the<WG3588> prince<WG758> of this<WG5127> world<WG2889> be cast<WG1544> out. <WG1854>
And I,<WG2504> if<WG1437> I be lifted up<WG5312> from<WG1537> the<WG3588> earth,<WG1093> will draw<WG1670> all<WG3956> men unto<WG4314> me. <WG1683>
<WG1161> This<WG5124> he said,<WG3004> signifying<WG4591> what<WG4169> death<WG2288> he should<WG3195> die.<WG599>

The <WG3588> people<WG3793> answered<WG611> him,<WG846> We<WG2249> have heard<WG191> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> law<WG3551> that<WG3754> Christ<WG5547> abideth<WG3306> forever:<WG1519> <WG165> and<WG2532> how<WG4459> sayest<WG3004> thou,<WG4771> The<WG3588> Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> must<WG1163> be lifted up?<WG5312> who<WG5101> is<WG2076> this<WG3778> Son<WG5207> of man?<WG444>

Then <WG3767> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> unto them,<WG846> Yet <WG2089> a little<WG3398> while<WG5550> is<WG2076> the<WG3588> light<WG5457> with<WG3326> you.<WG5216> Walk<WG4043> while<WG2193> ye have<WG2192> the<WG3588> light,<WG5457> lest<WG3363> darkness<WG4653> come upon<WG2638> you: <WG5209> for<WG2532> he that walketh<WG4043> in<WG1722> darkness<WG4653> knoweth<WG1492> not<WG3756> whither<WG4226> he goeth. <WG5217>

While <WG2193> ye have<WG2192> light,<WG5457> believe<WG4100> in<WG1519> the<WG3588> light,<WG5457> that<WG2443> ye may be<WG1096> the children<WG5207> of light. <WG5457> These things<WG5023> spake<WG2980> Jesus,<WG2424> and<WG2532> departed,<WG565> and did hide<WG2928> himself from<WG575> them.<WG846>
But <WG1161> though he<WG846> had done<WG4160> so many<WG5118> miracles<WG4592> before<WG1715> them,<WG846> yet they believed<WG4100> not<WG3756> on<WG1519> him: <WG846>

That <WG2443> the<WG3588> saying<WG3056> of Isaiah<WG2268> the<WG3588> prophet<WG4396> might be fulfilled,<WG4137> which<WG3739> he spake,<WG2036> Lord,<WG2962> who<WG5101> hath believed<WG4100> our<WG2257> report?<WG189> and<WG2532> to whom<WG5101> hath the<WG3588> arm<WG1023> of the Lord<WG2962> been revealed?<WG601>
Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> they could<WG1410> not<WG3756> believe,<WG4100> because<WG3754> that Isaiah<WG2268> said<WG2036> again,<WG3825>

He hath blinded<WG5186> their<WG846> eyes,<WG3788> and<WG2532> hardened<WG4456> their<WG846> heart;<WG2588> that<WG2443> they should not<WG3361> see<WG1492> with their eyes,<WG3788> nor<WG2532> understand<WG3539> with their heart,<WG2588> and<WG2532> be converted,<WG1994> and<WG2532> I should heal<WG2390> them.<WG846>
These things<WG5023> said<WG2036> Isaiah,<WG2268> when<WG3753> he saw<WG1492> his<WG846> glory,<WG1391> and<WG2532> spake<WG2980> of<WG4012> him.<WG846>

Nevertheless <WG3676> <WG3305> <WG2532> among<WG1537> the<WG3588> chief rulers<WG758> also<WG2532> many<WG4183> believed<WG4100> on<WG1519> him;<WG846> but<WG235> because<WG1223> of the<WG3588> Pharisees<WG5330> they did not<WG3756> confess<WG3670> him, lest<WG3363> they should be<WG1096> put out of the synagogue: <WG656>
For <WG1063> they loved<WG25> the<WG3588> praise<WG1391> of men<WG444> more<WG3123> than<WG2260> the<WG3588> praise<WG1391> of God.<WG2316>

<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> cried<WG2896> and<WG2532> said,<WG2036> He that believeth<WG4100> on<WG1519> me,<WG1691> believeth<WG4100> not<WG3756> on<WG1519> me,<WG1691> but<WG235> on<WG1519> him that sent<WG3992> me. <WG3165>
And <WG2532> he that seeth<WG2334> me<WG1691> seeth<WG2334> him that sent<WG3992> me. <WG3165>

I <WG1473> am come<WG2064> a light<WG5457> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> world,<WG2889> that<WG2443> whosoever<WG3956> believeth<WG4100> on<WG1519> me<WG1691> should not<WG3361> abide<WG3306> in<WG1722> darkness. <WG4653>

And <WG2532> if<WG1437> any man<WG5100> hear<WG191> my<WG3450> words,<WG4487> and<WG2532> believe<WG4100> not,<WG3361> I<WG1473> judge<WG2919> him<WG846> not: <WG3756> for<WG1063> I came<WG2064> not<WG3756> to<WG2443> judge<WG2919> the<WG3588> world,<WG2889> but<WG235> to<WG2443> save<WG4982> the<WG3588> world. <WG2889>

He that rejecteth<WG114> me,<WG1691> and<WG2532> receiveth<WG2983> not<WG3361> my<WG3450> words,<WG4487> hath<WG2192> one that judgeth<WG2919> him: <WG846> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> that<WG3739> I have spoken,<WG2980> the same<WG1565> shall judge<WG2919> him<WG846> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> last<WG2078> day. <WG2250>

For <WG3754> I<WG1473> have not<WG3756> spoken<WG2980> of<WG1537> myself;<WG1683> but<WG235> the Father<WG3962> which sent<WG3992> me,<WG3165> he<WG846> gave<WG1325> me<WG3427> a commandment,<WG1785> what<WG5101> I should say,<WG2036> and<WG2532> what<WG5101> I should speak. <WG2980>

And <WG2532> I know<WG1492> that<WG3754> his<WG846> commandment<WG1785> is<WG2076> life<WG2222> everlasting: <WG166> whatsoever<WG3739> I<WG1473> speak<WG2980> therefore,<WG3767> even as<WG2531> the<WG3588> Father<WG3962> said<WG2046> unto me,<WG3427> so<WG3779> I speak. <WG2980>
